channel.title: New Viewers on Escaping Perfection
channel.description: Recent content in New Viewers on Escaping Perfection

item.title: An Introduction
item.description: Its rather late tonight, but I think its a perfect time to finally introduce myself. You may call me Absurd Abstract, Absurd, A, or anything inbetween. I am not entirely sure if this website works, or where it reaches, but here I work as a asseser of technologies. If you are reading this from another planet, world, or timeline, my job is basically to edit the outputs of computational intelligence software.
